title: Computer Systems
description: Organization of modern general purpose, high speed digital computer systems. Design of arithmetic units, control units, memories and memory subsystems. Cost, power and speed trade-offs in the design of such systems. 3 seminars, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/EEÂ 521.
prerequisites: CPE/EE 329 or CPE/EE 336, or equivalent, and graduate standing or consent of instructor
